comments: Mr. Razdhr made class very fun and exciting. He made me want to come to class every day because learning was fun. I really enjoyed having his class. He\'s awesome!

Professor Razdrh is a funny guy that keeps class pretty interesting. Does blackboard assignments on fridays instead of actually having to go to class. Extremely helpful and clear. Not much work; you will make a good grade if you just pay attention in class and learn the terms from the book for tests. Also, he drops your lowest test grade.
He wasn\'t our professor for our class at the time, but when he\'d come in for Mike on Mondays was awesome! Great guy, has a passion for the psychology field and highly recommend.
Really great teacher. You either know it or you dont kind of class. Raw humor, pretty funny guy

Really nice guy! made class interesting. NO CLASS ON FRIDAY! blackboard assignment instead :)! Tests are multiple choice and short! all questions come straight from the chapters. so READ! no quizzes or anything! pretty easy class!
